course_title: Special Topics in Religious Education Part A: Learning & Empathy
class_notes: (ON CAMPUS intensive) (Enrollment in RE 698B 1 (1 hour) online in Spring 2023 is also required). This course begins with an intensive introduction to the practices and principles of Marshall Rosenberg's process of Nonviolent Communication (NVC). The development of empathy skills is central to NVC. This section will include an exploration of how NVC might fit into a life committed to social justice ministry and work. The course will then move to explore a sampling of pedagogical methods and the ways that they relate to empathy as a path of learning.)(break from Noon-1pm)
